data.text:
TRAVEL ELEVATED

NONSTOP FLIGHTS ARE AVAILABLE TO:

• Orlando/Sanford, FL (SFB) Year-round

• St. Petersburg/Clearwater, FL (PIE) Seasonal

• Myrtle Beach, SC (MYR) Seasonal

BOOK NOW

YEAR-ROUND FLIGHTS TO

Orlando, FL

Enjoy convenient access to Orlando’s World Class

attractions including Disney and Universal Theme Parks, Daytona Beach,

New Smyrna Beach, Cocoa Beach and Port Canaveral.

BOOK NOW

HGR > MYR

Flights to Myrtle Beach return May 24, 2024

BOOK NOW

ENJOY

Free Parking

for the entire duration of your trip!

Newly Renovated

Hagerstown Regional Airport has completed its terminal expansion project,

creating more seating for our passengers and shelter from the elements while the plane is boarded.

Office Hours: Monday-Friday, 8:30 a.m. – 4:30 p.m.

Travel Elevated

Affordable Rates

HGR offers affordable rates for all of our flights

Free Parking

Enjoy free parking for the duration of your visit

Short Wait Times

Skip the crowd and long lines when you fly HGR

Affordable Rates

HGR offers affordable rates for all of our flights

Free Parking

Enjoy free parking for the duration of your visit

Short Wait Times

Skip the crowd and long lines when you fly HGR

Allegiant Air, the self-proclaimed “Official Airline for Sunshine” is offering scheduled service from Hagerstown Regional Airport (HGR) to:

Orlando Sanford International Airport (SFB)

St. Petersburg/Clearwater, FL (PIE)

Myrtle Beach, SC (MYR)

Complete vacation packages at special rates.

Book online at allegiantair.com or by phone at 702-505-8888.

HGR provides limited in-person ticket counter hours.

Call the Hagerstown Regional Airport Administrative office at 240-313-2777 for more information.

True Cost CalculatorWhat Could You Save by Flying with HGR?

With free parking, easy interstate access, and short lines, avoid the hassle and stress of flying out of larger congested airports. Start your trip out right and learn what you could save by flying with Hagerstown Regional Airport!

Your Address* Number of Days Parked* HGR airfare bwi airfare iad airfare dca airfare mdt airfare

Orlando/Sanford

Florida (SFB)

Year-Round Flights

Located in Seminole County, North Orlando, visitors wishing to experience Florida’s natural features need look no further. Enjoy convenient access to Orlando’s World Class attractions including Disney and Universal Theme Parks, Daytona Beach, New Smyrna Beach, Cocoa Beach and Port Canaveral.

St. Petersburg/Clearwater

Florida (PIE)

Flights Available Until 8/13/24

Resuming 10/3/24 - 11/10/24

A sparkling gem on Florida’s Gulf coast, St. Pete/Clearwater has the perfect ingredients for your best vacation yet: beautiful beaches, vibrant arts, family fun and a superb food and drink scene.

It’s a place that does its own thing, one that invites you to come do yours.

Myrtle Beach

South Carolina (MYR)

Flights 5/24/24 - 11/11/24

Myrtle Beach, South Carolina is where cherished memories are made along 60 miles of beautiful coastline. Discover stunning sunrises over the Atlantic Ocean, fun days at the beach, lush natural wonders, and grand new adventures. Savor our fresh coastal cuisine, and our unique flavor of fun.
